project.name: Canadian Distributed Infrastructure for Genomics (CanDIG)
project.description: CanDIG is building a platform for providing federated data discovery and analytics of health research data, especially genomics data, while preserving local control.   We focus on a standards-based approach, participating in and following the Global Alliance for Genomics and Health (GA4GH) standards process.   We're moving from a v1 monolith to an upcoming service-oriented and "data-mesh"-inspired v2.
project.license_type: v1 is Apache2 licensed.  Our nascent governance process is deciding the license for v2.
